channel.title: Article: What Spotify must do to survive
channel.description:
[BBC News: What Spotify must do to survive](https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/technology-43237139)
Talks about the company, the pending IPO, the streaming landscape (vs download competitors), the smart algorithms, etc...
An interesting read.
